Posts.Content: Kind words and sound advice.   Thank you
Posts.Title: Would a Doctor tell you they thought a lump was benign if they weren...

Posts.Content: I had a mammogram, ultrasound and then a core biopsy today after finding a lump on my upper inner breast a few weeks back. The doctor told me she was sure it was benign.  I will get the results next week.  My question is, is there a chance she’s wrong and if not, why would she feel the need to perform the biopsy? Would she tell me this if she wasn’t sure.  I’m so worried
Posts.Title: Would a Doctor tell you they thought a lump was benign if they weren...

Posts.Content: Thanks for the reply.  I was happy when doctor told me she was sure it was benign but now I’m worrying.
Posts.Title: Would a Doctor tell you they thought a lump was benign if they weren...
